text: Hi. If I was to build out an entire website on HubSpot before we point our root domain to the platform does anyone know what would be the best solution to do this? I am thinking of a quick migration etc. Would you have to build it out on a sub domain first? Thanks
No need for a subdomain.  you would build it out on your hubpsot domain (something like `<http://company-HubSpotID.hs-sites.com>`) and then point your root domain at your HubSpot instance

HubSpot portals come with a `.<http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com>` subdomain for you to build your site out on before launching. Thereâ€™s no set-up required for this, comes out of the box when you create a HubSpot portal.
